summary: Adds in five new books about Stros M'Ki, the Sload, Jyggalag, Umaril, and Lorkhan. New Books Will Be Coming Out Every Other Week.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds in four new books which are filled up with lore that is not yet known in the world of skyrim they can all be purchased by all book sellers. All books can be found in the winterhold library.

As a lot of this lore has been coverd in other books, there will
be a major update so adding almost 20 new books and they will
all have custom covers

I will release an updated version when I have added a batch of  
new Lore books about every other week.

I used this for my source: http://uesp.net/wiki/Main_Page

Stros M'Ki is a small island off the coast of hammerfell
The Sload are enhabetence of Thras
Jyggalag is the daedric prince of order cursed by the other daedric prices.
Lorkhan is the creator of Nirn where all elder scrolls games take place
Umaril is the Aylied half elf who was ruler of tameriel

Big Thanks To DanielCoffey For Fixing Bugs and Making Book Covers!
Profile(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3204267/?tb=feed&pUp=1)

New Books:
Stros M'Ki
The Sload(Skill Book)
Jyggalag
Lorkhan(Skill Book)
Umaril

Planned For Version 1.3:
Amularious(This was not in the lore but i added it because
at the begining when you ran into the tower with
rolaf and ulfric, rolaf says "its a dragon just like
the children story's and the legends. There was
never any books about these story's so this is what
this book is about, planned to be in the honerhall
orphanage. Amulatious is a made up dragon and tells about
his tales)

Biography on Arch Mage Savos Aren(Simple Biography on
the Arch mage.)

Mysterium Xarxes(Yes This Book Was Destroyed after the oblivon
crisis but Hermais Mora had the power to create is own
copy of the tome, meaning this will require dragonborn,
you will have to finish a quest or two for him and
he will reward you with the book, it will also
add in Mace of Aevar Stone-Singer.

Adding in auther Kunnra High-Mountain to dragonbridge

Study On The Dragon Bridge(By Kunnra High-Mountain,
she moved to dragon bridge to study it and find out
its secrets.)

Map of Skyirm(A Map of Skyrim That Shows Everything,
 Dragonborn + Dawnguard Support)
author: Napy
